long.ar,hi,id,tr,vi:
## Adjust Page Brightness 🔅

Customize your browsing experience with precise brightness control and advanced features for every website you visit.

### Key Features:
- 🎚️ Precise brightness control (10% to 200%)
- 🌓 Automatic day/night mode
- 🎯 Site-specific settings
- 🌙 Night mode filter with customizable color
- 📊 Usage statistics and analytics
- ⌨️ Keyboard shortcuts (Ctrl+Shift+↑/↓)
- 🖱️ Quick access via right-click menu
- 💾 Export settings and statistics

###  How It Works:
1. Click the extension icon to open the control panel
2. Use the slider to adjust brightness
3. Enable auto-mode for automatic day/night adjustments
4. Save site-specific settings for your favorite websites
5. Right-click anywhere on a webpage to quickly add it to your managed sites
6. Monitor usage with built-in analytics

### Easy Access Options:
- Extension popup for detailed controls
- Right-click context menu for quick site addition
- Keyboard shortcuts for instant adjustments
- Badge showing current brightness level

### 🎯 Perfect For:
- 👀 Reducing eye strain
- 💻 Late night browsing
- 📱 Different lighting conditions
- 🎮 Gaming websites
- 📖 Reading articles

### Privacy & Performance:
- No data collection
- Works offline
- Minimal resource usage
- No external dependencies

### 🆘 Support:
For support or feature requests, please visit our GitHub repository or contact us through the Chrome Web Store.
long.am,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,e:
## Adjust Page Brightness 🔅

Customize your browsing experience with precise brightness control and advanced features for every website you visit.

### Key Features:
- 🎚️ Precise brightness control (10% to 200%)
- 🌓 Automatic day/night mode
- 🎯 Site-specific settings
- 🌙 Night mode filter with customizable color

- ⌨️ Keyboard shortcuts (Ctrl+Shift+↑/↓)

- 💾 Export settings and statistics

###  How It Works:
1. Click the extension icon to open the control panel
2. Use the slider to adjust brightness
3. Enable auto-mode for automatic day/night adjustments
4. Save site-specific settings for your favorite websites
5. Right-click anywhere on a webpage to quickly add it to your managed sites
6. Monitor usage with built-in analytics

### Easy Access Options:
- Extension popup for detailed controls
- Right-click context menu for quick site addition

### 🎯 Perfect For:

### Privacy & Performance:

- Works offline

### 🆘 Support:
For support or feature requests, please visit our GitHub repository or contact us through the Chrome Web Store.


🎉 New Update: 5 Languages Added! 🌍

We’ve just updated Adjust Page Brightness to make it even better for our global users! 🚀

🌐 What’s New?

Added support for 5 new languages: Hindi, Vietnamese, Indonesian, Turkish, and Arabic! 🗣️

Improved compatibility with Dark Mode and enhanced Control Tab Brightness features.

Minor bug fixes and performance improvements. 🛠️

Thank you for your support! Try the new version now and enjoy a more localized browsing experience. 😊
